idprovider-desc: A MediaWiki service extension that provides (unique) IDs in several ways
idp-random-apiparam-type: Choose a random ID generation algorithm
idp-random-apiparam-wikipage: Checks that the ID does not  already an existing wikipage
idp-increment-apiparam-prefix: Prefix / namespace that comes before the increment. Each prefix gets it's own increment state.
idp-increment-apiparam-padding: Minimum length of the generated increment number. Fills it with leading zeros. E.g. padding=5 results in 00001
idp-increment-apiparam-wikipage: Checks that the ID does not  already an existing wikipage
